/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a bustling city street bathed in the warmth of a sunny day. The sky, a vast expanse of blue, is lightly speckled with a few clouds. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene.

On either side of the street, a variety of buildings rise up, their facades painted in a palette of mostly white and gray, punctuated by occasional splashes of red and green. These structures vary in height, creating a dynamic skyline that adds depth to the image.

The street itself is a hive of activity. Cars, painted in shades of black, white, and gray, are scattered across the road, some parked neatly by the side of the street while others are in motion, adding a sense of dynamism to the scene.

Trees, their leaves a vibrant green, line the street, providing a touch of nature amidst the urban landscape. Streetlights stand sentinel at regular intervals, ready to bathe the street in light as dusk falls.

The image is taken from a high vantage point, offering a bird's eye view of the street below. This perspective allows for a comprehensive view of the scene, capturing the essence of city life in a single frame.
